name: witlessly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is stupid, or that shows no intelligence: Her style has been both witlessly admired and widely copied. The shop assistant was just staring witlessly into space and didn't even notice that customers had come in.
More examplesFewer examplesI witlessly threw away the packaging before I realized that the instructions were still inside. The lorry driver witlessly tried to pass beneath a low bridge and ended up getting stuck.
